backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage, authorization mixins, Stripe config, and data models for users, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, and payments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including pages, components, hooks, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color variables, dark theme overrides, and shared background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling identity, backend actor readiness, profile fetch, startup timeouts, and routing for payment result pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI card displaying an access denied message with optional back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Card component that displays deal analysis details including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating badge.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main app layout with sidebar navigation, lazy‑loaded pages, and session handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays buyer info, contact details, budget, and areas with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Modal form for creating, updating, and deleting buyers with validation and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays deal contracts with loading, error states, and view actions.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles selecting, validating, and uploading contract files with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows key deal details including address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Modal form for creating, editing, and deleting deals with stage selection and buyer assignment.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a lock screen for restricted features, showing required tier and providing an upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Generates a 6‑month bar chart summarizing profit and fees from deals using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Shows a data‑loading error message with retry, optional secondary action, and contact‑support button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Provides a required onboarding dialog for entering and saving user profile info.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table listing profit totals grouped by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Displays the main sign‑in UI using Internet Identity with branding and value props.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Shows a fatal startup error UI with retry and contact‑support options.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Shows a branded full‑screen loading screen with optional message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Similar to useActor but waits for identity initialization, conditionally initializes admin access, and exposes readiness states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations such as profiles, deals, admin checks, membership, payments, and error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines a dark theme with custom color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Contains UI copy strings for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, admin pages, and support.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Implements basic deal‑analysis math functions like MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Provides helpers for checking membership‑tier access and limits, plus a function for generating locked‑feature messages.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats and parses USD amounts to and from cents stored as bigint.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Provides support email constants and helpers for generating or opening mailto links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin UI for managing membership pricing, assigning tiers, and configuring Stripe settings, gated by admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Shows analytics metrics and profit‑by‑zip data, enforcing Enterprise‑tier access and handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Displays and manages the buyer list with membership gating, loading/error states, and a dialog for creating or editing buyers.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides contract upload and management tied to selected deals, gated to Enterprise users with full loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows deal metrics, charts, and membership info based on fetched deals, with loading and error fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Runs AI deal analysis from an address and lets users create a new deal from the results with validation and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Manages deals grouped by stages with membership limits, providing creation/editing dialogs and robust loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership tiers and pricing, allowing users to start a Stripe checkout session for upgrades with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message, shows optional session ID, and provides buttons to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms a successful payment by validating the session ID, updating the user profile, and handling loading or error states with navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended color themes, fonts, shadows, and includes animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, known issues, requested fixes, and feature requirements for improving reliability and adding contact options.
